name: CastleThief
description:
V1.0

Castle Thief was made across a total of 4 days of development. The player needs to navigate the randomised castle and escape once all the treasure on the 'Shop'n list' has been collected.

Controls:

W - Use Door / Use Exit Door

S (Hold) - Pass through thin platforms

A/D - Left / Right

Space - Jump

Walking enemies can be defeated by jumping on their head. Floating Eye enemies cannot be defeated, and watch out for their fireballs! The Exit door is where you started the game, return there once all the items on the 'Shop'n List' have been collected (a collected item's name turns red).

Please enjoy my game. Thank you.

IF YOU GET THE ERROR 'The Application is damaged and cannot be opened':

1. Make sure the application has been moved into the 'Applications' folder

2. open the terminal

3. copy this command into the terminal and press enter: xattr -cr /Applications/CastleThief.app

4. You should now be able to open the game without further difficulty!

Also, please note I had no way to test the windows version so it may not be working. I would greatly appreciate any feedback so that I can assure both editions are functioning as intended. Thanks!
